title: Drawing, "Design for an Ark Curtain, Beth Am Synagogue, Los Altos, California", 1968–69
medium: Crayon, graphite, brush and silver paint, beige gouache on tan paper
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Curtain of three panels with white, gold and yellow ground.  Five lines of Hebrew text in shades of blue and crimson run across bottom third of curtain, with central panel of text dropped down below those on two sides.  Two rows of white Jewish stars are woven into fabric above texts.  Four horizontal stripes of blue and crimson run beneath texts.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for an Ark Curtain, Beth Am Synagogue, Los Altos, California", 1968–69.
1968–69. Crayon, graphite, brush and silver paint, beige gouache on tan paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-71.
